mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ranking_weekly (member_uid, distance) ( SELECT m.uid, SUM(r.distance) FROM rent AS r JOIN member AS m ON r.member_uid = m.uid WHERE r.start_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY m.uid );
